participant_2.background:
I love to edit videos and spend time with my pug on rainy days.
My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
if things are not done right i will redo them again and again.
i sleep most of the day.
I spend my free time fixing up junk cars and making YouTube videos about it.

content.text: It's going great! I just got back from a run.
Nice! I love running. I'm a competitive ski racer and I have to train all the time.
That's awesome! I'm not really athletic but I love to edit videos and spend time with my pug on rainy days.
That sounds like a great way to relax. What kind of videos do you edit?
I make YouTube videos about fixing up junk cars. I also love to teach people and my first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
That's really cool! I'm glad you're able to do something you love for a living.
Me too! I love helping people and teaching them new things.
What are your plans for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a walk with my dog or watch some YouTube videos.
Sounds like a good plan. I'm going to go make dinner. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
